summary: Shimura Kingo fails his duty to protect the life of the Shogun's chief minister, and spends his life tracking down the assassins. However, all but one of the assassins die before Kingo can reach them. Still, Kingo presses on.
cast: Kiichi Nakai|Hiroshi Abe|Ryôko Hirosue|Masahiro Takashima|Sei Matobu|Eisaku Yoshida|Yoshikuni Dôchin|Yôichirô Ohmi|Yuria Kizaki|Tatsuya Fuji|Kichiemon Nakamura|Keiko Miyata
title: Zakurozaka no adauchi
